  2. Instagram's “Made with AI” label swapped out for “AI info” after photographers' complaints  The Verge
  3. Meta Switches AI Labels From 'Made With AI' to 'AI Info' Tag  Social Media Today
  4. Meta changes its labels for AI-generated images after complaints from photographers  Engadget
  5. Meta changes its label from 'Made with AI' to 'AI info' to indicate use of AI in photos  TechCrunch
